column4: Hello, I've helped my friend with his ubuntu on various issues, but now I'm puzzled myself
Is it an easy way to use maromedia-flash on amd64?
you have to ask macromedia to port it
there are some ways to use 32bit firefox
perhaps i386 mozilla from mozilla.org with ia32-libs would work
no, I don't use flash at all
you don't generally use gui tools for that
you edit /etc/fstab once and leave it alone
for dynamic things (like usb hard disks), they get mounted automatically
by the way, I tried it on hoary today
